sentences.en: A bridge collapsed in Buenos Aires and a volcanic eruption in Jakarta.
sentences.cn: 在布宜诺斯艾利斯有座桥塌了还有雅加达有座火山开始爆发.

sentences.en: A few days later, Vesuvius was in violent eruption.
sentences.cn: 几天以后, 维苏威火山猛烈爆发了.

sentences.en: A trend of thought ascribes the Bushveld Complex to eruption from more than one center.
sentences.cn: 有一种倾向认为布施维尔德杂岩体是多中心溢出的产物.

sentences.en: If a volcanic eruption wipes out all of the plain mice, the island will be repopulated by striped mice.
sentences.cn: 假设一次火山爆发消灭了所有的普通老鼠，那么这个小岛将是斑纹鼠的天下。

sentences.en: In this area the sheets could have originated from a separate center of eruption.
sentences.cn: 这地区的岩席可能发源于另一喷发中心.

sentences.en: It'seems that another eruption could be right around the corner.
sentences.cn: 如此看来,火山似乎又快爆发了.

sentences.en: Its most recent eruption began in 1992 and ended in 2002.
sentences.cn: 最近一次喷发从1992年持续到了2002年.

sentences.en: Our work was like that of geologists who compile the signs of an imminent earthquake or volcanic eruption.
sentences.cn: 我们的工作如同地质学家，我们收集一场即将到来的地震或火山爆发的迹象。

sentences.en: The eruption has left a thin veil of dust in the upper atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 火山爆发在高层大气中留下了一层薄薄的尘土。

sentences.en: The eruption of a volcano is spontaneous.
The extinct volcano's eruption would mean a cataclysm for the city.
sentences.cn: 死火山又重新喷发,对这座城市来说意味着大难临头.

sentences.en: THE INFLUENCE OF DENTAL FACTORS TO ERUPTION OF THE MANDIBULAR THIRD MOLAR.
sentences.cn: 牙齿因素对下颌第三磨牙萌出的影响.

sentences.en: The island was convulsed by the eruption.
sentences.cn: 该岛因火山爆发而激烈震动.

sentences.en: The last eruption of this volcano lasted over a year, so this cannot be ruled out.
sentences.cn: 该火山上次爆发持续了一年，所以现在也不能排除这个可能性。

sentences.en: The place was recently visited by a serious volcanic eruption.
sentences.cn: 这地方最近发生了一次严重的火山爆发.

sentences.en: The skin eruption is of value in suggesting the diagnosis.
sentences.cn: 皮肤疹对揭示诊断是有价值的.

sentences.en: The temple was destroyed in the violent eruption of 1470 BC.
sentences.cn: 庙宇在公元前1470年猛烈的火山爆发中摧毁了.

sentences.en: Then a lake formed, probably after an eruption blocked some rivers or streams.
sentences.cn: 可能是一次火山喷发之后,一些河流或溪水被堵塞了,形成了湖泊.

sentences.en: There is a eruption risk of Tengchong volcano in our country.
sentences.cn: 腾冲火山群是我国目前仍具喷发危险的火山群。
